description: Hike across a variety of terrain: woodlands, meadows, crests and valleys of the escarpment.  Sections of this trail follow the Bruce trail, with connecting trails forming several loops.  Some demanding up and down sections, a popular hiking spot to see fall colours.
directions: From the intersection of Highway 10 and Hockley Road (at the north end of Orangeville), drive east on Hockley Road for about 4km to '2 Line E' which joins from the south at an acute angle.  Park along the side of the road.
title: Hockley Valley Trails
